sentences.sentence: Up until a few decades ago, our visions of the future were largely—though by no means uniformly—glowingly positive.
sentences.translation: 直到几十年前，我们对未来的看法大体上还是积极热切的，尽管不完全是一致的。

sentences.sentence: In her letter she praised him glowingly.
sentences.translation: 她在信中热情地赞扬了他。

sentences.sentence: The evacuation of all their forces was glowingly represented as a triumphant success.
sentences.translation: 他们的全军大撤退被堂而皇之地描绘为一次伟大的胜利。
